DOC.brief_summary: The objective study determine effect high protein , high fiber supplement pre-load energy intake subsequent meal compare low fiber , high carbohydrate Control product healthy overweight obese subject . The investigator hypothesize high protein , high fiber pre-load result reduce energy intake subsequent meal compare low protein , low fiber .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect High Protein , High Fibre Shake Pre-load Measures Satiety Subsequent Energy Intake
